attributes.action: Stop Uk Oil Company Surestream Petroleum From Drilling Lake Malawi For Oil
attributes.additional_details:
Sign this petition to show your disgust in Surestream-petroleum & Sacoil holdings from drilling lake Malawi When the US Gov declared in 1984 that lake Malawi hold very low yield of oil for the cost and damage it will cause.
Find More info Here
http://itzmylife.net/m/articles/view/Oil-Drilling-Lake-Malawi
We need the uk government to not go forward with allowing a uk company to destroy a lake of beauty with a seriously high biodiversity as lake Malawi.
